Album.name: Classic Spaghetti and Meatballs
Album.about: My mom was a New York Italian and this was a flavorful dish she loved to make whenever she felt like spoiling us on the weekends.

Album.name: Original Lousiana Gumbo
Album.about: Always a staple in our household. Passed down from my Great-grandfather to his daughter to my dad and then to me. I make mines with less heat though.
